author: nflaig
content: would be good to get someone from Nimbus to chime in on https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/457 as we had previous discussion regarding 415 error codes on their repo and closed the issue there to first define this on the spec

author: tersec
content: as a general point, the issue we had before was not per se 415, it was freelancing HTTP error codes outside of spec

author: nflaig
content: the goal of the PR is mostly to be more specific about 406/415 HTTP error codes in the spec as those are relevant if we wanna adopt ssz more broadly

author: nflaig
content: but clients are already using HTTP error codes outside of the spec, e.g. 404 is often used as "not implemented" while this is not defined in the spec
